text: The Farmers wing of the Tamil Manila Congress has condemned the seizure of tractor and consequent suicide by the farmer A. Alagar (26) of Orathur near Ariyalur, on Friday. In a statement issued here on Sunday, A. Nagarajan, state president of farmers’ wing of the party, said the recovery proceedings should be suspended till the completion of the election to Assembly. He sought the immediate intervention by the Chief Electoral Officer to impress upon the Centre to ensure peaceful conduct of poll to Assembly.
title: Seizure of tractor flayed
